attributes.action: invest in the establishment of a proton therapy treatment facility in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are currently NO proton therapy treatment facilities in the UK. Proton therapy is a means of treating cancer similar to chemotherapy but with less harmful side effects as it is more accurate. A facility would cost £20m and potentially provide life saving care for thousands of people each year. More information available here:
http://www.ccotrust.nhs.uk/document_uploads/HomePage/proton%20therapy-FINAL%2025-07-08.pdf
